name: mdjaman/mdjaman-common
description: Module that provides common functionality and library code for ZF2 & doctrine applications

suggest.doctrine/doctrine-orm-module: If you want to use Doctrine ORM
suggest.doctrine/doctrine-mongo-odm-module: If you want to use Doctrine ODM
suggest.imagine/imagine: If you need image manipulation after uploading image
suggest.ruflin/elastica: If you want to use elasticsearch as search server
suggest.predis/predis: If you want to use redis
